features: Premium Materials: Featured with shag area rugs 4 x 6, Deerhoo fuzzy rugs for bedroom consist of ultra soft faux fur on top, high-density sponge in the middle, and anti-skid woven backing. Velvet surface on the shaggy plush fuzzy rug doesn't shed easily, or have smelly odor. Perfect for kids and pets playing on the fine throw rugs for living room.

Ultra Soft Fluffy Rug: Because of the plush fur on the light grey rug, you'll feel like walking on the clouds when walk barefoot on the large bedroom rugs. Besides, the high pile shag soft carpet will also shield you from the cold floor, and stay fixed in place with anti-skid latex dots backing.

Ideal Option for Home Decor: The faux fur rug comes in multiple colors and sizes to fit your needs. Deerhoo tie-dyed light grey rugs for bedroom not only add color to your living room, bedroom, study or nursery, but also serve as highlights in home decoration, perfectly blending in your casual, modern or minimalist home decor.

Warm Tips on Care: Regarding the care of Deerhoo large rug 4 x 6 ft,both hand wash and machine wash are available. However, we suggest that you should use low power vacuum cleaner to vacuum the fluffy bedroom rug for a quick cleaning, or wipe the rugs with a damp cloth, which enables the nursery rug to stay in good shape for a long-term use, and the edges won't fall apart so easily.

Satisfying Customer Services: It usually takes 3-5 days for the rugs for living room to be restored to its original shape after unpacking from the vacuumed package. Colors might vary in different due to different display parameters. If you have any problems about this floor carpet, please feel free to contact our customer services team for a satisfying purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deerhoo Modern Tie-dyed Shaggy Plush Area Rug for Living Room Bedroom It’s not simply a fluffy shag rug, but provides you and your family with a cozy and warm area, where you could take a break from the busy work, tiring houseworks and schools. We take prides in offering you and your family with decent plush rug. All of the Deerhoo’s indoor rugs are made of premium material, nice to use. Perfect for kids and pets having fun on this soft floor carpet for living room.

Features Ultra Soft Area Rugs Faux fur on the large high pile rug is super fluffy and soft, making your spaces warm and cozy for you and your families. No Shedding Throw Rugs Unlike others, our tightly weaved velvet surface doesn’t shed easily. The edges of the colourful carpet don’t fall apart easily when in use. Anti-Skid Fluffy Carpets There’s anti-skid latex dots backing on the bottom of shaggy bedroom rugs, which keeps the area rugs from moving around when people walk by.

Fluffy Rugs for Bedroom When you read book sitting on the shag rug, or walk freely with barefoot on the fuzzy area rug, you could literally feel ease at home. Modern Living Room Decor The modern area rug not only is stylish in its minimalist design, but also comes in various colors and sizes to serve as home decor in rooms of different styles. Nursery Rug for Kids Room With the incredibly velvet touch, the fuzzy rug is very soft for kids' delicate skin, and also shields your baby from touching cold floors. No worries for kids having fun on the shag rug.

All for a Comfy Life What is Deerhoo? Experts on high-quality textiles Take customers above all Dedication to provide premium items Deerhoo Fluffy Shag Area Rugs for Bedroom Indoor Shaggy Throw Rugs for Living Room Style: Modern, Minimalist, Casual Shape: Rectangular Size:4x6 ft, 5x8 ft, 6x9 ft, 8x10 ft Color: Tie-dyed Light Grey, Dark Grey, Blue Grey, Beige, Purple, Coffee, Pink and PurpleCream White, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Green
Deerhoo Fluffy Floor Carpets for Living Room Bedroom Playroom Study Nursery

Warm Tips from Deerhoo 1.Due to the vacuumed packing, the rugs for living room need 2-3 days to be restored to it shape. You’ll see the fluffy plush throw rugs by the time. 2.You could use vacuum cleaner to vacuum dusts and trashes on the shag rug, and also wash the washable rug by hand for deep cleaning. 3.Color may vary in little bit from its actual color, due to different parameters on displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and thick
reviews.reviewText: This rug was a perfect addition to my apartment. It’s soft and cozy to sit on, vacuums easily, or is light enough to bring outside for a shake and the price was superb. I’ve seen some reviews complaining about the odor upon opening; this is from being vacuum sealed for delivery and the plastic smell was gone after opening in just a few hours. I’ll be purchasing more for other rooms in our apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and thick!
reviews.reviewText: Great rug for the price! Very thick and soft. Great for any area of your home! Pretty color too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping. Very soft but not thick at all. It’s very pretty. Had to spot clean second day I had it and it cleaned just fine with some carpet cleaner and a damp rag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Transforms the living room experience.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Deerhoo Large Shag Area Rug for my living room on Amazon, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. The tie-dyed design adds a trendy and unique touch to my space, instantly enhancing the overall aesthetics.The plush and fuzzy texture of the rug is a game-changer. It's incredibly soft and feels luxurious underfoot, making my living room not only stylish but also inviting and comfortable. The 5 x 8 size fits my space perfectly, adding warmth and coziness to the room.One of the standout features is the ultra-soft fluffy feel of the rug. It's a joy to walk on, and my family and guests have all commented on how comfortable it is. The quality of the material is impressive, and I can tell that it's built to last.Cleaning and maintaining the rug have been surprisingly easy. Despite its fluffy appearance, it doesn't trap dirt easily, and any spills or stains have been simple to spot. This is a big plus for me as I wanted a rug that's both stylish and practical.Overall, the Deerhoo Large Shag Area Rug has exceeded my expectations. It's a fantastic addition to my living room, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality, stylish, and ultra-soft shag rug for their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I almost didn’t get the rug because a lot of the comments said it was thin. I actually love that it’s thin. It lays very nicely, but it’s not flimsy. It’s also extremely soft and the color is beautiful. I’ve bought tons of rugs and this is the best one that I’ve got for the price ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars horrible chemical smell-ALLERGIC REACTION!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this, when i opened the air tight bag i was hit with a horrible smell. I can’t describe the smell but it was awful, chemically, and reeked. Didn’t think too much about it and then i put the rug down. The smell came right up off from the rug and was smelling up my whole apartment. I decided to wait it out and see if it would disappear. I was wrong. my two cats wouldn’t go on the rug because they were so confused and disgusted about the smell. the walked around the perimeter and jumped the corners just so they wouldn’t have to touch it. about 2 hours later i go to look into the mirror…. my face was beet red along with my neck and chest. my first thought was not the rug but after my boyfriend thought it was the rug immediately it all made sense. not only was the smell so bad, when in a different room the smell was stuck in my nose for hours. i put the rug outside and clicked return immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alittle thin but soft and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: Although it is alittle thin side it is fluffy and big enough to cover the living area and it is so soft that my babies love to lay on it without a blanket and actually fall asleep so definitely will buy it again for another area in the home 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color not true to picture
reviews.reviewText: This rug is incredibly soft and comfortable. Was skeptical when I opened the package because it’s vacuum sealed. It popped right out to shape. My only issue is in ordering the brown color. It is more of a pinkish brown, and did not fit the decor at all in the room I ordered it for. Kept the rug because it is so comfortable and soft and using it in another room. Overall, the quality seems great but at least the brownish color is not true to picture.
